alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 08 at 10:39PM PST until February 09 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility frequently less than a quarter of a mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Central Willamette Valley and South Willamette Valley, including the Salem, Corvallis and Eugene areas. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will continue to form and spread across the central and south Willamette Valley. Expect gradual improvement as the fog thins later Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; South Willamette Valley
